src:
Inspirado nas Kardashians, reality com a família Poncio ainda busca contrato para exibição
Clã ficou famoso após caso de traição entre cunhados

02 Nov 2019, 12:39


São Paulo

Após dar um nó na cabeça de muitos internautas com sua história de traição entre cunhados, a família Poncio quer ir para a televisão.
O clã criou um reality show, Los Poncios, no modelo de Keepin Up with the Kardashians, programa que acompanha as americanas Kim, Khloe e Kourtney Kardashian em suas rotinas.
Só que, de acordo com o jornal O Dia, o patriarca da família, o pastor Marcio Poncio, informou que os planos iniciais de negociar a exibição do reality com a Netflix não vingaram.
“Infelizmente não saiu por aqui. Era nosso desejo, mas não chegamos a um bom acordo", teria dito o pai de Saulo e Sara Poncio.
O seriado também acompanharia sua nora, Gabi Brandt, e o genro Jonathan Couto, que se envolveu em um escândalo por ter traído Sara com a atriz Letícia Almeida, antiga namorada de Saulo, com quem teve uma filha.



Gallery: Saulo Poncio e Gabi Brandt se casam no Rio de Janeiro
text:
Inspired by Kardashians, reality with Poncio family still seeks contract for exhibition
Clan made famous after brother-in-law treason case

02 Nov 2019, 12:39


Sao Paulo

After tying the heads of many Internet users with their story of betrayal between brothers-in-law, the Poncio family wants to go to television.
The clan has created a reality show, Los Poncios, in the model of Keepin Up with the Kardashians, a show that follows Kim, Khloe, and Kourtney Kardashian in their routines.
However, according to the newspaper O Dia, the family's patriarch, Pastor Marcio Poncio, reported that the initial plans to negotiate the reality show with Netflix did not succeed.
“Unfortunately it didn't come out here. It was our wish, but we didn't come to a good deal, "said Saulo's father and Sara Poncio.
The show would also accompany his daughter-in-law, Gabi Brandt, and son-in-law Jonathan Couto, who was involved in a scandal for betraying Sara with actress Leticia Almeida, Saulo's former girlfriend, with whom she had a daughter.



Gallery: Saulo Poncio and Gabi Brandt get married in Rio de Janeiro
